title: YourBank Launches AI-Powered Financial Advisor
summary: YourBank introduces a new AI-based financial advisor tool to help users manage savings more efficiently.

title: YourBank Partners with GreenTech
summary: A strategic partnership aimed at promoting sustainable banking and carbon-neutral initiatives.

title: YourBank Expands into Europe
summary: YourBank is now available in 5 new European countries, offering multi-currency banking solutions.
